entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 7:14 PM CST Friday 7 April 2023
